ngiemboon: Yelemî la gíŋe ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ tetʉ́a papyɛ́b jʉʼ. Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gíŋe ḿbɔ́ɔnte, ńgɔɔn né yé ngie:
en: While he was still confined in the guard’s courtyard,   the word of the Lord came to Jeremiah a second time:

ngiemboon: «Anò gie nyìŋ gẅie à gÿo mɔɔn menò, á gẅie à táŋte ḿbiŋe ńtÿɔ́gɔ na jʉʼ gie e ge tyé wó, á nyìŋ gẅie à gɔɔn ngie:
en: “The Lord who made the earth,   the Lord who forms it to establish it,  # 33:2 Gn 2:18–19 the Lord is his name,  # 33:2 Ex 6:3 says this:

ngiemboon: Gaʼte ńtóŋo wɔ́ɔn, n júʼ ḿbÿɛɛ nò jú, ńgÿo ɔ̀ zsé shúm selÿò, é shúm sie ée lelyěen, é sie ɔ̀ te ne ńzsé wɔ́.
en: Call to me and I will answer you   and tell you great and incomprehensible things you do not know.  # 33:3 Is 48:6

ngiemboon: Ńtí nue Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, é Ssé pa Ésàlayɛ ka gɔɔn nò, ńtí mendá mie ée tÿǒsoŋo Yelúzálèm, lâ mendá mefùɔ pà Yúndà, mie palÿɔ́ʼncù la tág, ńdɔg ńgÿo zyɛ̀ʼɛ,
en: For this is what the Lord, the God of Israel, says concerning the houses of this city and the palaces of Judah’s kings, the ones torn down for defense against the assault ramps and the sword:

ngiemboon: páʼ mé ka gʉa ńdÿɔ́ʼ pʉ̀a Mbambilonia ńdɔg mepfó pʉ̀a mesoŋ pie n ka lɔgɔ gyáŋalóŋ yɔ́ɔn pɔ́ mbÿàglóŋ yɔ̀ɔn, ńzẅéte, ńdúe mendá, ńtí nue menò tepòŋ mie ée tÿǒsoŋ ŋwɛ́ ka gÿo, n tém nzèm yɔb.
en: The people coming to fight the Chaldeans will fill the houses with the corpses of their own men that I strike down in my wrath and fury. I have hidden my face   from this city because of all their evil.

ngiemboon: Táʼ, n ge gÿo gíŋe gÿo yɛ̌ tÿǒsoŋ à gáŋ, é gÿo pʉ̀a pie é tsẅé wó e zeŋe, é piŋ gÿo pɔ́ gẅiin mbʉ́lè, ḿbiŋ ńnéŋe wó té pɔ́g.
en: Yet I will certainly bring health   and healing to it and will indeed heal them. I will let them experience the abundance  # 33:6 Or fragrance; Hb obscure of true peace.  # 33:6 2Kg 20:19; Est 9:30; Is 39:8

ngiemboon: N ge gÿo gíŋe lɔg megàŋatsǎŋ pʉ̀a Yúndà mbɔɔ pe Ésàlayɛ, é piŋ nzèm, é gÿo pɔ́ gáŋ tà ńgíŋe ńgwɔ́ páʼ pɔ́ la zɔɔn ńgwɔ́.
en: I will restore the fortunes   of Judah and of Israel and will rebuild them as in former times.  # 33:7 Is 1:26

ngiemboon: N ge gÿo sele wɔ́b tà pɔ́ gwɔ́ ndʉalʉ̌a, á na menò tepòŋ ntsèm mie pɔ́ la gÿo na mèŋ. N ge gÿo gẅiin tsɔ́ɔnmezìŋe nzèm pɔ́b ntí tʉʉtwó yɔ́b.
en: I will purify them from all the iniquity they have committed against me,   and I will forgive all the iniquities they have committed against me, rebelling against me.

ngiemboon: N ge gÿo gẅiin lekág ńtí tÿǒsoŋ ŋwɛ́, mbɔɔ wɔ̀ɔn legúʼ ńgÿo wɔ̀ɔn leŋwáŋte, n ge gÿo gẅiin lekág á tsetsɛ̀ɛ mengwòŋ ntsèm mie ée ndùmo ssé tsetsáʼ. Afʉ̀ʼ gie pɔ́ ge gÿo gyá nò mbòŋo, mbɔɔ mbʉ́lè ntsèm gie n ge náa mbwó pɔ́b, pɔ́ vɛ, ecÿɔʼ gwoon wɔ́b tà pɔ́ pú ḿbɔ́g.
en: This city will bear on my behalf a name of joy, praise, and glory   before all the nations of the earth, who will hear of all the prosperity I will give them. They will tremble with awe because of all the good and all the peace  # 33:9 Jr 8:15; 14:19 I will bring about for them.

ngiemboon: Anò gie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ne ńgɔɔn á yɔɔn: Pi, á gẅí pʉ̀a Yúndà, pi ne ńgɔɔn ésele ńgɔɔn ngie tÿǒsoŋ gí áa ye ntǎg, tà mé te gíŋe ńne ńgyá nyìŋ mesoŋ kà nɔ̀ɔn wɔ́, á wó wɔ́. Áa nénʉ́ mbà metÿǒsoŋo Yúndà mbɔɔ me Yelúzálèm ée lyɛ̌ʼɔɔn ńcʉ́ʼʉ kwòŋotsẅɛ. Táʼ, mé ge gÿo gíŋ júʼ mengyè wó sẅésẅé,
en: “This is what the Lord says: In this place, which you say is a ruin,   without people or animals #— #that is, in Judah’s cities and Jerusalem’s streets that are a desolation without people, without inhabitants, and without animals #— #there will be heard again

ngiemboon: é mengyè melínɔ̀ɔn, é mengyè lekág, mbɔɔ mezɔ̀bɔ ntse lɔ́ɔnndá púɔ ngwàshùm. Mé ge gÿo gíŋe júʼ mengyè pʉ̀a pie é ne ńzɔbɔ, ńdɔgɔ shúm pwɔʼ sɔ́b ńtóo ndá Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ńgɔɔn ngie:
en: a sound of joy and gladness, the voice of the groom and the bride,   and the voice of those saying,

ngiemboon: Anò gie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gẅie à piʼi kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ gíŋe ńgɔɔn á yɔɔn: «Mé ge gÿo gʉa tsɛ̀ɛ ngwòŋ ŋwɛ́ gẅie mé la tág, mé le gíŋe ńgyá nyìŋ mesoŋ kà nɔ̀ɔn wɔ́ɔ wɔ́, é piŋ gʉa tsɛ̀ɛ metÿǒsoŋ mé ntsèm, é gíŋe gyá jʉʼ gie ńgwɔ́ papféle menjʉ̀njÿò mɔ́b lâ mvfó yɔ́b, é zẅɛte wó letsẅɛ́ʼ.
en: “This is what the Lord of Armies says: In this desolate place #— #without people or animals #— #and in all its cities there will once more be a grazing land where shepherds may rest flocks.

ngiemboon: Á ge gÿo gwɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ metÿǒsoŋ mie ée ndùm mekwɛ́, mbɔɔ mie ée Shÿefela, ńgÿo me Nengɛb, é mie ée tsɛ̀ɛ pàga ngwòŋ Mbɛŋjÿamɛŋ, á na kème láʼa Yelúzálèm, mbɔɔ tsɛ̀ɛ metÿǒsoŋo Yúndà, papyɛ́b mvfó lâ menjʉ̀njÿò gíŋe sáŋ púɔ menɔ̀ɔn.» Cʉ̀apʉ̀a zɔ gɔɔn púʼu.
en: The flocks will again pass under the hands of the one who counts them   in the cities of the hill country,  # 33:13 Jr 17:26 the cities of the Judean foothills, the cities of the Negev, the land of Benjamin #— #the areas around Jerusalem and in Judah’s cities, says the Lord.

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ne ńgɔɔn ngie: «Á ne ńkuʼu páʼ n ge lɔgɔ shwóŋè yɔ́ɔn gÿo mmó gie n da kaʼa mbwó pʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ, mbɔɔ mbwó pʉ̀a Yúndà.
en: “Look, the days are coming” —

ngiemboon: Afʉʼó ge gÿo gwɔ́, n gÿo mé zyé tàʼ múɔ mbàŋa na ngẅɛ̀ ndá Ndavîd gẅie aa ngàŋa nò nénʉ́. À gwɔ́ gẅie à ge gÿo mé giŋe tsɛ̀ɛ ngwòŋ páʼ lepʉ̌ mbɔɔ nò nénʉ́ ne ńzɛ́te.
en: In those days and at that time

ngiemboon: À ge gÿo gwɔ́ tà ne sáʼa láʼ, epʉ̀a Yúndà tsẅɛ́, epʉ̀a tÿǒsoŋo Yelúzálèm néŋe té pɔ́g. Mé ge láʼ tóŋo Yelúzálèm lê: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a aa wege letsẅɛ́.»
en: In those days Judah will be saved,

ngiemboon: Anò gie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gɔ̌ɔn á yɔɔn: «Mé téen ńdáʼa ńzága nyìŋ na tsìŋendá Ndavîd gẅie ngwɔ́ á gwɔ́ fùɔ pʉ̀a láʼa Ésàlayɛ wɔ́.
en: “For this is what the Lord says: David will never fail to have a man sitting on the throne of the house of Israel.

ngiemboon: Á gíŋe ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ púʼu na ngẅɛ̀ ndá Lěvî, páʼ mé téen ńdáʼa ńzága panuŋepwɔʼ mvfò mèŋ wɔ́, é pie é ge tó, é nuŋe shúm pwɔʼ gẅie mé tuɔ nɔ̀ɔn tà á pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm, é sie ndyé wɛ̌ ge kwɔ́ʼ kẅɛ́te wɔ́ɔn, é piŋ gwɔ́ lyɛ̌ʼ ntsèm é nuŋe shúm pwɔʼ mbʉ́lè.»
en: The Levitical priests will never fail to have a man always before me to offer burnt offerings, to burn grain offerings, and to make sacrifices.”

ngiemboon: Ashwóŋè gie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la gɔɔn né Yelemî á yɔɔn:
en: The word of the Lord came to Jeremiah:

ngiemboon: «Kwàʼ mèŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a zɔ gɔɔn ngie: Tà à lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pi gÿo tà zsǒ sele ńcʉ́ʼ tsẅɛ́ʼ, tà zsǒ le pɔ́ɔnte tsẅɛ́ʼ, atsẅɛ́ʼ piŋ le pɔ́ɔnte zsǒ wɔ́ɔ? Ngǎŋ!
en: “This is what the Lord says: If you can break my covenant with the day and my covenant with the night so that day and night cease to come at their regular time,

ngiemboon: Áa yɛ̌ tá n gɔɔn ngie, akʉ̀a gie peg Ndavîd gẅie aa ngàŋafàʼ wɔ̀ɔn la gwa, ngwɔ́ me le láʼ ḿbyág wɔ́. Mé téen ńdáʼa ńzága múɔ mbàŋa na ngẅɛ̀ ndá ye gẅie ngwɔ́ á sáʼa láʼa Yelúzálèm, kà lézága nyìŋ na ngẅɛ̀ ndá Lěvî gẅie à ge ne faʼa mbwó mèŋ páʼ nùŋepwɔʼ wɔ́ɔ wɔ́.
en: then also my covenant with my servant David   may be broken. If that could happen, then he would not have a son reigning on his throne and the Levitical priests would not be my ministers.  # 33:21 Is 61:6; Ezk 45:4–5; Jl 1:9,13

ngiemboon: N ge gÿo kẅiʼi ngẅɛ̀ ndá Ndavîd gẅie aa ngàŋafàʼ wɔ̀ɔn, mbɔɔ ye Lěvî gie e faʼa mbwó mèŋ páʼ panuŋepwɔʼ. Pɔ́ ge gÿo gyɔ́ɔn páʼ mecÿɔ́ʼsaŋ mie ée lefaŋ, mbɔɔ páʼ memvòm sàŋasáŋa mie ée ngʉ̀ŋe máŋʉ́ tà ngwɔ́ mé le sáŋ.»
en: Even as the stars of heaven cannot be counted, and the sand of the sea cannot be measured,   so too I will make innumerable the descendants of my servant David and the Levites who minister to me.”

ngiemboon: Ashwóŋè gie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la gɔɔn né Yelemî á yɔɔn:
en: The word of the Lord came to Jeremiah:

ngiemboon: «Tsye ɔ̀ ka te júʼu nò gie pʉ̀a gɔɔn wɔ́ ka? Pɔ́ ne ńgɔɔn ngie n ka gwáʼ pʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ mbɔɔ pe Yúndà, é mengẅɛ̀ ndá mémbʉ́a mie n da tsɔ́ʼ! Epʉ̀a pie é gɔɔn púʼu, ée pʉ̀a pie é zɔɔn te gíŋe ńne ńdɔgɔ láʼ yɔ́ɔn ńtóŋo ngwòŋ wɔ́, pɔ́ cʉ́ʼʉ ńgwága láʼ yɔ́ɔn gwǎg.
en: “Have you not noticed what these people have said? They say, ‘The Lord has rejected the two families he had chosen.’   My people are treated with contempt and no longer regarded as a nation among them.

ngiemboon: Táʼ, anò gie mèŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gɔ̌ɔn á yɔɔn: Peg lâ zsǒ pɔ́ tsẅɛ́ʼ la gwáa kʉ̀a. N da záb membʉ̌ mɔ́ɔn lefaŋ mbɔɔ ndùmo ssé tsetsáʼ.
en: This is what the Lord says: If I do not keep my covenant with the day and with the night, and if I fail to establish the fixed order of heaven and earth,

ngiemboon: Tà à lɔɔn ńgwɔ́, n gwáʼ ngẅɛ̀ ndá Yakwɔ̂b, mbɔɔ ye Ndavîd gẅie aa ngàŋafàʼ wɔ̀ɔn la? Tà à lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ n dʉʼʉ légʉa tsetsɛ̀ɛ pɔ́b, ńtsɔ́ʼ mefùɔ pie é ge láʼ sáʼ pʉ̀a ngẅɛ̀ ndá Ábalaham, Ésàg mbɔɔ ye Yakwɔ̂b la? Ngǎŋ! Ngwɔ́ á le gwɔ́ púʼu wɔ́. N ge gÿo pɔ́ gíŋe ńgwɔ́ páʼ pɔ́ la zɔɔn ńgwɔ́, ńtí nue n gẅiin tsɔ́ɔnmezìŋe nzèm pɔ́b, n ge gíŋe gÿo pɔ́ gáŋ.»
en: then I might also reject the descendants of Jacob and of my servant David. That is, I would not take rulers from his descendants to rule over the descendants of Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob. But in fact, I will restore their fortunes   and have compassion on them.”  # 33:26 Jr 12:15; 30:18; 31:20; 33:7; 42:12
